comment: Howard (ATL) and Valentine (CHI) make incidental contact with one another during rebounding.
After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the floor of ATL possession is overturned and CHI is awarded possession.
[Observable in enhanced video] Schroder (ATL) never fully clears the lane and is in the paint without actively guarding an opponent for longer than three seconds.
Bazemore (ATL) legally contests Butler's (CHI) jump shot attempt.
Howard (ATL) sets the screen on Butler (CHI) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Rondo (CHI) sets the screen on Bazemore (ATL) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
[Detectable with stop watch] Howard (ATL) is in the paint without actively guarding an opponent for longer than three seconds.
Hardaway Jr. (ATL) and Valentine (CHI) make incidental contact with one another during rebounding.
Lopez (CHI) sets the screen on Bazemore (ATL) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
[Observable in enhanced video] Butler (CHI) moves his pivot foot.
LATR shows Howard (ATL) make contact to Butler's (CHI) head that affects his driving shot attempt.
[Observable in enhanced video] Lopez (CHI) never fully clears the lane and is in the paint without actively guarding an opponent for longer than three seconds.
Ilyasova (ATL) sets the screen on Butler (CHI) and gives him room to avoid the contact. The two players briefly engage and separate following the screen.
Carter-Williams (CHI) makes incidental contact with Schroder (ATL) that does not affect his SQBR.
Mirotic (CHI) sets the screen on Bazemore (ATL) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Howard (ATL) is in the paint without actively guarding an opponent for longer than three seconds.
Bazemore (ATL) makes contact to Butler's (CHI) arm and affects his jump shot attempt.
After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the floor that Butler (CHI) was attempting a 2 pt field goal when fouled is confirmed.
